channel.title: Uhhh..where to start?
channel.description:
I have some experence hosting things (Tribes, being one of them) And editing/tinking with things. But I have NO idea where to even start on runescape hosting.
There are some posts that start with [508] So..does that patch/client only work with a specfic runescape type?
Basically I would like a RS client/serverside thing where all the Rs files are open for editing. (such as, sprites, models, npc scripts etc) I already read the how to make a model tut, so no real issue there but still. It seems as though I almost end up downloading like 3-4 different things for different clients or something and all of it is somehow confusing. Is there anything with some scripts and stuff already made? So I can get how they work by messing around with them? (As far as I have seen, there are no scripts on RS when you first download the server hosting thing.) I work best when I have something to take appart to see how it works.

item.title: Uhhh..where to start?
item.dc:creator: @Frozen2Dream Frozen2Dream
item.description:
@Frozen2Dream wrote:

Okay, guys. Really, stop trollin’ eachother.
You guys txt talk and other things, whatever to each their own.
Please, for the love of sanity, stop it >_>;

Also, so…if 317’s are larger, does that mean there is more to mess around with/edit?
or is 317’s just ‘uncompressed’?

Read full topic

item.title: Uhhh..where to start?
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

[quote="–BBLLAARRGGHH–, post:6, topic:315889"][quote author=imsokool22 link=topic=412336.msg3039761#msg3039761 date=1259018348]
zane please learn to spell the word “you” right because it is you not yu!
i would download a warscape client and use that for editing but make a copy incase u mess something up
[/quote]
imsokool, please learn how to spell the word ‘I’m’ and ‘Cool’ correctly. Also, you put down ‘u’ there, which is just plain hypocritical.[/quote]
thats how i spell my name your name is dumb its just random letter any1 could think of random letters idiot!

Read full topic

item.title: Uhhh..where to start?
item.dc:creator: @Frozen2Dream Frozen2Dream
item.description:
@Frozen2Dream wrote:

Thanks guys.
I’ll wait a bit more for feedback though, I want to see if anyone else agrees for warscape before I download something. xD
EDIT:
I keep hearing about a 317 client? What is this?/where can I get it? (I googled, and searched here, I find peoples servers, not the client itself)
What is the difference between that and a 508?

Read full topic

item.title: Uhhh..where to start?
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

zane please learn to spell the word “you” right because it is you not yu!
i would download a warscape client and use that for editing but make a copy incase you mess something up
EDIT:now dont criticize me you idiots!

item.title: Uhhh..where to start?
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

yu wont find anything like that. Your best chances are to download a source and download a blank source. Then create a server from that testing if you wanna be technical.

But if your new to rsps servers then forget that completely because millions have tried with this type crap and most have failed. So just download a source/client and code it and call it a day. Or study the tutorial sections. Those are your only chances otherwise it wont work.

Read full topic
